Localized date helpers

Localizes the date_select helper by loading the default options from the language file. The distance_of_time_in_words however can only be localized by reimplementing it here. Every result is based on a string from the language file.

Many other helpers are based on these two so the localization of these helpers should localize many other.

Used sections of the language file

This feature uses the date_select and distance_of_time_in_words section within the helpers section: 

  helpers:
    date_select:
      order: [:year, :month, :day]
    distance_of_time_in_words:
      less than 5 seconds: less than 5 seconds
      less than 10 seconds: less than 10 seconds
      less than 20 seconds: less than 20 seconds
      less than a minute: less than a minute
      1 minute: 1 minute
      half a minute: half a minute
      n minutes: %i minutes
      about 1 hour: about 1 hour
      about n hours: about %i hours
      1 day: 1 day
      n days: %i days
      about 1 month: about 1 month
      n months: %i months
      about 1 year: about 1 year
      over n years: over %i years

The date_select section contains new default options for the date_select helper so you can overwrite all options this helper accepts. The distance_of_time_in_words section contains a map of translated strings used to build the output of this helper.

[Validate]
